Title: Exempts from sales and compensating use taxes any equipment or product purchased by restaurant or food service establishment for use in outdoor dining during the novel coronavirus (COVID-19)
Summary: Exempts from sales and compensating use taxes any equipment or product purchased by a restaurant or food service establishment for use in outdoor dining during the novel coronavirus (COVID-19).
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting from sales and compensating use taxes any equipment or product purchased by restaurant or food service establishment for use in outdoor dining during the novel coronavirus (COVID-19)
